column4: I'm still using 10.10 but I'd like to get rid of the stupid volume control popups. I'm using a plain 104-us keyboard and a 5 button USB mouse. I can't seem to get the volume popup that appears at random to go away, or find a button to disable. Please help :(
i never had any volume popup
like i said never had that problem and i know the popups but never had any of that on 10.10
but as cellthunder said remove it from the tray if it does that
